Revere.New England Holocaust Memorial:
The New England Holocaust Memorial is a memorial in Boston, Massachusetts, U.S. It is dedicated to the Jewish people who were killed by Nazi Germany during the Holocaust.


== Information ==
Designed by Stanley Saitowitz, founded by Holocaust Survivor Stephen Ross, and erected in 1995, the memorial consists of six glass towers under which a visitor may walk. Engraved on the outside walls of each tower are groups of numbers representing the six million Jews killed in the Holocaust.
